short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension helps company internal members to stay informed with Trigvent's Latest Updates.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: It will replace new tab with custom tab having Trigvent Solutions' news and developments widgets to stay up-to-date.
